item.title: Darth Vader's Theme - Ukulele TAB playalong
item.description:
For educational use. This tutorial shows ukulele students how to play the melody of The Imperial March (from Star Wars), also known as Darth Vader's Theme, on the uke.
Optimized for GCEA ukulele.

item.title: Panic! At The Disco - Into The Unknown
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele.
Chords Used: G, D, Bm, Dm, C, F, Dm7, A, D, E, C#m, Cm, Bb
As performed by PANIC! AT THE DISCO, as featured in Disney's FROZEN II
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/YEm7Bj0L1eM
Chord chart ("Tabs") available at: https://ukutabs.com/p/panic-at-the-disco/into-the-unknown/
**************************************
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. Motion video background from https://www.motionbolt.com
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.

item.title: You're The One That I Want - Ukulele Play Along - Key of C
item.description:
Ukulele play along
You're The One That I Want John Travolta and Olivia Newton-John From the film - GREASE
Using the chords: Am C E7 Em F G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU D DU or D DU UDU Try doubling the strum speed once you can play it confidently.
This video is meant for educational purposes and ukulele lessons.
No copyright infringement intended.

item.title: Various Artists - The Window Cleaner - Key of C
item.description:
Ukulele play along
When I'm Cleaning Windows (In C) - George Formby
Using the chords: A7 C C7 Cdim7 D7 E7 F G G7
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU DU DU
Notes: This is a higher key than our other version.
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Various Artists - The Window Cleaner - Key of G
item.description:
Ukulele play along
When I'm Cleaning Windows - George Formby
Using the chords: A7 B7 C D D7 E7 G G7 Gdim7
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU DU DU
Notes: The audio has been slightly lowered to make it easier to play
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Beyoncé - SPIRIT - Key of G
item.description:
For educational use. Chords Used: G D Em C B7 Am F
Spirit (from Disney’s The Lion King) by Beyoncé. It’s been raised by 2 semitones and the modulation has been removed so beginner ukulele students can play along. Also, the “quick change” chords have not been included. As for the B7 chord, feel free to do it 432X instead of using the barre.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6 . We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Chihiro Otsuka - Baby Mine - Baritone Ukulele - Key of D
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE ukulele. Key of D.
Chords Used: D, Em, A7, G, Dmaj7, A7
From Dumbo (2019 Motion Picture).
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/LyqCyg853Fs
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Naomi Scott - Speechless - Key of Em
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for CGEA ukulele. Key of Em.
Chords Used: Em, D7, C, D, G, Bsus4, B, Am, Bm7
Original performance by Naomi Scott, from the (2019) motion picture "Aladdin"
Earlier today, I had posted a version of this without the "follow the chord boxes." I'm not quite sure where they went, as I start with the ukulele version and then move to other versions. So, I have re-uploaded the video. Sorry for any inconvenience.
Do you enjoy these videos? If so, please click on the tutorial video and subscribe to the sister channel to this channel. This channel will feature only video play alongs, and the sister channel will feature all of my original content.
Tutorial Video (GCEA chords & Strumming/Finger Picking): https://youtu.be/aH4_OQ2pNiI
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The baritone ukulele chord font is from ukefarm.com.
The Motion background video is from motionbolt.com
There is a master list of all similar play along videos at my blog: ukestuff.info. Access to the blog, and all materials on the blog is free.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel!
